name: Vampirate
languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Explode
entries: When the vampirate is reduced to 0 hit points, it explodes in a cloud of ash. Any creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 1d10}) necrotic damage.

traits.name: Spider Climb
entries: The vampirate can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The vampirate doesn't require air or drink.

actions.name: Energy Drain
entries: {@atk ms,rs} +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft., one creature. 11 (2d10 damage) necrotic damage. A Humanoid reduced to 0 hit points by this attack dies and instantly transforms into a free-willed shadow under the DM's control.

actions.name: Light Crossbow
entries: Ranged atk +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 11 (2d8 + 2 damage) piercing damage.
